cells.data: -- pureT :: f a -> (a -> f a)on pureT(x)	if class of x is record and keys(x) contains "type" then		set t to type of x		if t = "Either" then			pureLR		else if t = "Maybe" then			pureMay		else if t = "Tree" then			pureTree		else if t = "Tuple" then			pureTuple		else			pureList		end if	else		pureList	end ifend pureT
